Instructions for FuzzyGroup Hosting Customers

Hello there,

As a FuzzyGroup hosting customer, you need to know how to upload content, what facilities are on our server and available to you, how to change your email password and so on.  This document, while not 100% complete, is a first step in instructing you in all these topics.  At the end we have also included a small FAQ.
